title: Initial thoughts: Opus 4.5 vs Gemini 3 Pro vs Codex-Max
description: Three-model bakeoff debugging a 30-minute Celery/RabbitMQ crash and how each model judged the others.

codeSnippet.code:
; RabbitMQ broker-side ack timeout (ms)
consumer_timeout = 1800000

; Celery worker (conceptual)
worker_prefetch_multiplier = 1
; late acks defer ACK until task completes
; task_acks_late = True
; add heartbeat to keep connection alive
broker_heartbeat = 60
